attributes.action: Let Bus Enthusiasts Persue their hobby
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recent weeks several people(myself included)have been stopped for photographing buses as we are branded a threat to the security of our country.In many ways we are extra eyes/ears for the police

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
